sentences.sentence: How many legs does a centipede have?
The creature is a tiny centipede, just 10 millimetres long.
sentences.translation: 那个生物是一只很小的蜈蚣，只有10毫米长。

sentences.sentence: There was once a one-legged dragon who said to the centipede, "How do you manage all those legs?''
sentences.translation: 从前有一条独脚龙，它对蜈蚣说：“你如何管理那么多腿？”
